law.catch_line: Licensing of retailers -- Liability insurance required.
law.text: The board or its designee shall license retailers under the provisions of KRS 227.550 to 227.660. The issuance of a license shall be contingent upon the applicant's chief managing officer passing a test administered by the department. Before issuing a license, the department shall require proof of liability insurance which shall name the department in the certificate of insurance, and the license shall be null and void if there is a lapse of coverage in insurance.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 419, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 8, effective July 13, 2004. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 76, sec. 7.
